inclusion.criterion: Patients must have previously treated (> 1 cycle prior therapy), active multiple myeloma requiring treatment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have measurable disease defined as one of the following: serum monoclonal protein >/= 1.0 mg/dl, OR urine monoclonal protein >/= 1.0 grams/24 hour, OR >/= 20% bone marrow plasmacytosis.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All necessary baseline studies for determining eligibility must be obtained within 35 days prior to registration.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a performance status of 0-2 based on SWOG criteria.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with a poor performance status (3-4), based solely on bone pain, will be eligible.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a platelet count > or = 100,000/microliters.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All patients must be informed of the investigational nature of this study and must sign and give written informed consent in accordance with institutional and federal guidelines.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients must not have received a prior autotransplant or allograft.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with recent (< o= 6 months) myocardial infarction, unstable angina, difficult to control congestive heart failure, uncontrolled hypertension, or difficult to control cardiac arrythmias are ineligible.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with systemic amyloidosis and is on hemodialysis. She has a history of relapse and has received various treatments including melphalan, prednisone, VAD regimen, autologous stem cell transplant, thalidomide, and velcade.
